thread.title: Best experience in Paris

author: maye302002
title: Best experience in Paris
text: I have to tell that be there is like to be inside a Dream, very Cozy place, people are Lovely, all they are!!, Danielle I really appreciate your kindness, also perfect location, great breakfast!!, lovely place to be there!! Thank you all!, I can't wait for my card on Christmas!! I Would definitely back there some day!!
